name: VoltMobi
description:
VoltMobi LLC. is a result-focused company developing custom mobile applications and information systems for a variety of business sectors. We go all the way from business analysis, planning and design to application development, testing, launch, and support. We know the value of collaborative development and work side-by-side with our clients to help maximize the benefits of custom mobile applications.
Mobile application development focus:
•    iOS (iPhone, iPad).
•    Android.
•    Wearables.
Service lines:
•    Building creative concepts of software products and systems.
•    UI and graphic design.
•    iOS and Android mobile application development.
•    Web-based solution development.
•    Software integration, testing, and support.
•    Product marketing.
Industry focus:
•    Business Services.
•    Restaurants and Hospitality.
•    Information Technology.
